data.title: B Long to Elbow Seize
data.description: When executing the B Site, use this Seize lineup to prevent Defenders from successfully pressuring your team. Or, to simply take elbow control.

data.title: Showers to A Site Haunt Execute
data.description: Enable your team with this powerful Haunt lineup, as it clears most of the A Site. Defenders may hide Triple, or at the Barrel back site.

data.title: Short to Top of A Site Execute Haunt
data.description: Use this simple, but effective Haunt lineup to scan any Defenders playing the front side of the A Site. This will not scan players at Triple or Showers.

data.title: Front Left A Site Haunt from A Short
data.description: Here's a Haunt lineup from the right side of A Short that reveals players holding many common angles on the left side of A Site, as well as some of back A Site.

data.title: Front B Site from B Long
data.description: Here's a Haunt lineup from B Long that clears out the entirety of front B Site.
